SELECT task.*,agriculturalmachinery.am_id,agriculturalmachinery.am_licensePlate,agriculturalmachinery.am_SN, driver.did,driver.dname,homeworkseason.hs_id,homeworkseason.hs_name FROM task,agriculturalmachinery,driver,homeworkseason WHERE task.am_id=agriculturalmachinery.am_id AND task.did=driver.did AND task.hs_id=homeworkseason.hs_id
AND tgrouping LIKE concat(concat('%',#{tGrouping}),'%')
AND am_SN LIKE concat(concat('%',#{am_SN}),'%')
AND am_licensePlate LIKE concat(concat('%',#{am_licensePlate}),'%')
AND dname LIKE concat(concat('%',#{dName}),'%')
AND ttype LIKE concat(concat('%',#{tType}),'%')
AND taverage LIKE concat(concat('%',#{tAverage}),'%')
AND tmachineryType LIKE concat(concat('%',#{tMachineryType}),'%')
AND tauditState LIKE concat(concat('%',#{tAuditState}),'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(tbeginTime,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{tBeginTime}
AND DATE_FORMAT(tendTime,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{tendTime}
order by tid desc limit #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
